turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need a place to pick up order at Bella Luna for two medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! what would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On one of them I want half ham and pineapple and the other half of that to be sausage and then on the other pizza I want half green pepper and the other half pepperoni. Yeah, pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I want both of them to be thick crust if available.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright 2 medium pizzas, with thick crust. the first pizza has one half with ham and pine apple, the other half sausage. And the 2nd pizza is half green peppers, and the other half pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it. It was thick crust. If you said that, I missed it. But yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, thick crust for both!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! the total for those will be $ 28.44.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright! give me one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright! all set, your order is being prepared.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. 40 minutes. They're busy today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, for a friday i guess that's normal! Well you have a great day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. You, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: goodbye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
